content.heroIntro: Welcome to VILLA TEGI, an exceptional residential development in El Chaparral, Torrevieja, crafted by the renowned developer DK TILL SPANIEN. Offering sophisticated 4-bedroom villas from €895,000, VILLA TEGI represents a premier opportunity for discerning buyers seeking quality, location, and investment potential on Spain's Costa Blanca. Each villa features 167m² of meticulously designed living space set on generous 930m² plots, combining modern architecture with Mediterranean charm. With completion scheduled for November 1st, 2026, these homes are perfectly positioned to capture the thriving Torrevieja market, where property values have grown 8% year-on-year. Torrevieja boasts Spain's largest expat community with English widely spoken throughout, making integration seamless for international buyers. VILLA TEGI offers the ideal blend of coastal lifestyle, investment security, and developer expertise that discerning purchasers demand.

locationSection.intro: El Chaparral is one of Torrevieja's most desirable residential neighborhoods, strategically positioned between the vibrant town center and pristine Mediterranean beaches. This established area offers the perfect balance of suburban tranquility and urban convenience, with excellent access to world-class amenities. The neighborhood is renowned for attracting international buyers who appreciate its proximity to blue-flag beaches, championship golf courses, and comprehensive healthcare facilities. El Chaparral's tree-lined streets, modern infrastructure, and friendly expat community create an welcoming environment for families, retirees, and investors alike. The area benefits from ongoing development and investment, ensuring strong property appreciation and rental demand.
